SELECT COUNT(1) AS totalCount, COUNT( CASE WHEN `type` = 'following_user' THEN 1 WHEN `type` = 'register_welcome' THEN 1 WHEN `type` = 'collect_post' THEN 1 WHEN `type` = 'register_init_pwd' THEN 1 END ) AS sysCount, COUNT( CASE WHEN `type` = 'like_post' THEN 1 END ) AS zanCount,
COUNT( CASE WHEN `type` = 'reply' THEN 1 WHEN `type` = 'comment' THEN 1 WHEN `type` = 'reply_at' THEN 1 END ) AS replyCount FROM club_notification WHERE user_id = #{userId} and is_read = 0

SELECT cn.notification_id, cn.user_id, cn.sender_id, cn.relation_id, cn.type, cn.is_read, cn.create_time FROM club_notification cn WHERE cn.user_id = #{userId} AND cn.type IN ( 'reply', 'comment' ) ORDER BY cn.create_time DESC
